Reference

Core Functionalites

~ Functions for finding points, AOIs, and bounding regions

getAOI()

Get Area of Interest (AOI) geometry

getBoundingBox()

Get mimimum bounding box of spatial features

geocode()

Geocoding

revgeocode()

Reverse Geocoding

Tools

~ Tools for exploring, describing and defining AOIs

bbox_sp()

Convert bounding box string to geometry

bbox_st()

Convert spatial geometry to string (data.frame)

buff()

Buffer AOI

check()

Generate Leafet map and tool set

describe()

Describe an AOI
